mapper.select: select id, name, age, address, account, mobile from user
mapper.insert: insert into user(name, age, address, account, password, mobile) values (#{name}, #{age}, #{address}, #{account}, #{password}, #{mobile})
mapper.update: update user set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, address=#{address}, account=#{account}, password=#{password}, mobile=#{mobile} where id = #{id}
